trans_title: 抹大拉的玛丽亚：艺术作品中的荡妇形象
抹大拉的玛丽亚：绯红色的艺术形象
introduction: Waldemar Januszczak explores the impact of Mary Magdalene's myth on art and artists. All saints in art are inventions, but no saint in art has been invented quite as furiously as Mary Magdalene. For a thousand years, artists have been throwing themselves at the task of describing her and telling her story, from Caravaggio to Cezanne, Rubens to Rembrandt, Titian to van Gogh.Her...
chinese_title: 抹大拉的玛丽亚：艺术作品中的荡妇形象
